title: Squat
description: Put the bar on your back, sit down, stand up

title: Overhead press
description: Put the bar on your shoulders, press it up

title: Bench press
description: Put the bar on your chest, press it up

title: Deadlift
description: Put the bar on the floor, pick it up

title: Pull-up
description: Grab the bar, pull yourself up

title: Row
description: Grab the bar, pull it to your chest

title: Push-up
description: Put your hands on the floor, push yourself up
